net.sf.sanity4j.maven.plugin
Class RunQAMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
          net.sf.sanity4j.maven.plugin.RunQAMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenMultiPageReport, org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReport
@Mojo(name="sanity4j",
      requiresProject=false,
      requiresDependencyResolution=TEST,
      requiresDependencyCollection=TEST)
public class RunQAMojo
extends org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport

This class is a Maven plugin that runs Sanity4J against a project's source code and classes.

This task simply configures up a QAProcessor and then runs it in the #executeReport() method.

Since:
Sanity4J 1.0
Author:
Darian Bridge

Method Detail

executeReport

public void executeReport(Locale locale)
                   throws org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReportException
Executes this mojo, invoking the QAProcessor which has already been configured by Maven using either the annotations or the POM (through reflection).

Specified by:
executeReport in class org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
Parameters:
locale - The locale
Throws:
org.apache.maven.reporting.MavenReportException - Thrown if a problem occurs generating the report.

getTransitiveDependencies

public void getTransitiveDependencies(String artifact,
                                      List<String> jars)
Resolves the list of Transitive Dependencies for the specified artifact.

Parameters:
artifact - The artifact for which to resolve the transitive dependencies.
jars - The list for which to populate the resolved file paths for all the transitive dependencies.
